intro: Psychotria jauaensis, commonly known as the Jauaense Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptic leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, dark blue to black berries that are edible but have a mild, sometimes bitter taste. Psychotria jauaensis is often found in humid, shaded understories of tropical forests.
